name: Sorting Algorithms
description: Questions about common sorting algorithms, their properties, complexities, and use cases.

questions.text: What is the best-case time complexity of Bubble Sort?
questions.explanation: Best case is O(n) when array is already sorted, as it only needs one pass to confirm.

questions.text: What is the average time complexity of Quick Sort?
questions.explanation: Quick Sort averages O(n log n) due to its divide-and-conquer strategy with efficient partitioning.

questions.text: Which sorting algorithm is guaranteed to have O(n log n) complexity in all cases?
questions.explanation: Both Merge Sort and Heap Sort guarantee O(n log n) complexity in all cases.
